body.subject: implementation.json created - ws1 completed, continuing implementation
body.summary: implementation.json created with ws1 (Domain & Contracts) description. 2/18 tasks completed, coverage 95.45%. Continuing implementation of remaining workstreams per plan.json. After completing all workstreams, will provide full test_evidence (integration, smoke, security, performance tests).
key_points: ws1 completed: Domain & Contracts (2 tasks, coverage 95.45%)
All domain entities pure Python - no database schema changes
Memory repository will extend Day 25 - MongoDB schema compatible (new fields optional)
Skills will be stateless adapters - no data migration needed
concerns: Deployment blocked until all workstreams completed and quality gates passed
Performance tests and security tests will be added in ws8 per plan.json
Integration tests will be added for each workstream per test_spec
body.action_needed: Continuing implementation of ws2-ws8. After completing all workstreams and passing quality gates (release_gate: true), deployment will be ready. Current status: ws1 completed, ws2 in progress.
